short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful Mountain scenery for you to enjoy looking at.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 
Shows the time in 12hr format.
Instead of normal background you can have a great look at the most beutiful Mountains!
Full HD background, no ugly SD look in your browser.
 Random Quotes for the user to read.
depending of time of day the background image will change.

Give me FEEDBACK if there is anything wrong with the extension!
Also if you liked the extension give me a REVIEW thanks!
